attributes.action: Make marijuana legal for medical uses
attributes.additional_details: Marijuana holds negative connotations around the recreational uses and often is smugged for its purpose. But the benefits within cancer patients is astounding. From reducing tumours by half within a month of using, to evening curing and repressing relapse, MM needs to be easily accessible for medical uses in today's society. By having access to dispensaries and prescriptions MM could save thousands of lives like his. Watch "Weed The People" (Netflix) to understand the incredible benefits of MM
attributes.background: For decades, marijuana has been illegal in many countries such as mine,UK, but its benefits have been drowned out by its negative recreational uses. Recently a friend of mine relapsed for the 3rd time from AML- Acute Myeloid Leukemia at aged19 but there are facts that MM could actually save his life
